SELECT s.`id` ,s.`create_at`,s.`modify_at`,s.`code`,s.`addr`,s.`name`,s.`pic`,s.`info`,s.`del`,s.`area`,s.`type`,s.`longitude`,s.`latitude`,s.`mobile`,t.name `type_name` FROM `shop` s left JOIN shop_type t on s.type=t.code
1=1
AND s.`code` like CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND s.`addr` like CONCAT('%',#{addr},'%')
AND s.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND del=1 Order by s.`id` desc

SELECT s.`id` ,s.`create_at`,s.`modify_at`,s.`code`,s.`addr`,s.`name`,s.`pic`,s.`info`,s.`del`,s.`area`,s.`type`,s.`longitude`,s.`latitude`,s.`mobile`,t.name `type_name` FROM `shop` s left JOIN shop_type t on s.type=t.code WHERE 1=1 and s.`del`=1 Order by s.`id` desc
SELECT * FROM `shop` where id=#{id} AND del=1 Order by `id` desc
SELECT * FROM `shop` WHERE `del`=1 AND `area` = #{area} Order by `id` desc
SELECT * FROM `shop` WHERE `name` like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND `del` = 1 Order by `id` desc
